text: Risky Business is a 1983 American teen comedy movie written and directed by Paul Brickman and starring Tom Cruise and Rebecca De Mornay. Risky Business was a critical and commercial success, making more than $63 million against a $6.2 million budget. ==References== Category:1983 comedy movies Category:1980s teen comedy movies Category:American comedy movies Category:Warner Bros. movies
title: Risky Business
